title: Distribution of democratic features index
subtitle: Based on the expert estimates and index by the [Bertelsmann Transformation Index (2024)](#dod:bertelsmann-transformation-index), scaled by countries' populations. It combines information on the extent of political participation, the rule of law, stable democratic institutions, political and social integration, and a capable state. It ranges from 1 to 10 (most democratic).

relatedQuestions.text: How do different approaches score democracy across the world?
